subject: Compatible of Pedal
description_text:
Is the "Pro X Pedal Upgrade New Simsonn Pedals for Racing Simulator" compatible with Sim-lab "GT 1 Pro & GT1 Evo" Sim cockpit?
Also, what software is this compatible with and does it come with the license?

Regards,Ore

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: 你好，Adedotun Adeyemo，  请将安装支架的照片发送给我们，我们将帮助您评估安装是否可行——大多数情况下，安装没有问题。 此外，我们的 SIMSONN Manager 软件和 SIMHUB 9.9.3 遥测软件均免费提供。
